The sample from the clone Megatron continued to grow, it was now 
about three inches round. Veratis didn't know exactly what to do, it 
seemed to be reaching out for something. "Prepare a protoform with 
the Virus, it must be contained at all costs." Veratis' plee seemed 
desperate, the sample was far more important than anyone realized. It 
was a sample from the decendant of one of the greatest leaders in 
cybertrons history.

Foxfingers prepared a protoform for DNA processing. "You realize that 
this one will be as bad if not worse than the last right?" Foxfingers 
had met some Tron class bots in his functional life, now he was 
helping create one. 

"We have the ont thing that his other creators didn't, Maximal DNA." 
he programmed one of the other samples for attachment. "What better 
combination for the beast leader of the predacons then a great dragon 
maximal." The DNA he was using was from Necromancer, the great 
dragons DNA was being combined with that of a Tyranosaurus Rex. Two 
of the most powerful beasts in the history of this world were being 
combined to create a powerful Ally. Veratis grinned a wicked grin as 
the processor recognized the DNA that had been injected into it.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> Veratis and Foxfinger repeated thier message multiple times with no
> response. "Turn it off Foxfingers, they're not coming to us." A 
look of
> disapointment spread over his face. He'd so hoped for more students 
to
> study, and teach,.
> 
> Foxfingers clicked off the comm ending transmission. "It's probably 
the way
> it was meant to be." The foxbot read the disapointment in the old 
scientists
> eyes, "If the matrix wanted it to happen then it would have." he 
studied the
> board when there was a surge of power from the lab.
> 
> Veratis said nothing as he turned. Foxfingers leapt from his seat
> transforming to fox before he'd hit the ground. he dashed into the 
lab
> knowing that in Veratis' state he'd be to late. With the grace of 
the animal
> he'd transformed into he zigzagged across the floor to the console 
on the
> other side. Once there he transformed back to bot and ran a 
diagnostic.
> 
> One of the samples had breeched the container. The sample of DNA 
he'd
> stollen from the predacon base was growing. The sample he'd taken 
from the
> Megatron clone was reacting strangely to being stored away.
> 
> "I've been meaning to talk to you about your little side trip into 
Predacon
> territory." Veratis commented when he joined the fox at the console.
> 
> "You knew? I shouldv'e known." The foxbot stood in a state of near 
shock
> when Veratis spoke."So, what else did Ice tell you?
> 
> Veratis smiled a half smile as he listened to his student 
speak, "Ice told
> me nothing. I know where you were for one reason." he paused a 
suspensfilled
> pause, "Where else could you have stolen a sample from Megatron 
himself?"
> 
> "That's a sample from Megatron?", Foxfingers was now completely in 
shock,
> he'd stolen a sample from the insane leader of the Predacons. That 
was truly
> an article to add to his resume.
